result.markdown:
---
title: "Explorando Dados"
author: "Ricardo Accioly"
date: "2023-03-31"
output:
  html_document:
    toc: yes
    code_download: yes
---




## Carregando bibliotecas


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
data(iris)
```
:::


## O que temos aqui?


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
head(iris)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
  Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa
2          4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2  setosa
3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa
4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa
5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa
6          5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4  setosa
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% count(Species)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
     Species  n
1     setosa 50
2 versicolor 50
3  virginica 50
```
:::
:::


## Quais são as médias?


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarize(across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 3 × 5
  Species    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width
  <fct>             <dbl>       <dbl>        <dbl>       <dbl>
1 setosa             5.01        3.43         1.46       0.246
2 versicolor         5.94        2.77         4.26       1.33 
3 virginica          6.59        2.97         5.55       2.03 
```
:::
:::


## Vamos ver se temos alguma relação entre as variáveis


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Width, y=Sepal.Length, 
                                   color=Species)) + geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06A/3-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::


## Vamos ver se temos alguma relação entre as variáveis 2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Sepal.Width, y=Sepal.Length, color=Species)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm", se=FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06A/3a-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::


## Vamos ver se temos alguma relação entre as variáveis 3


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% ggplot(aes(x=Petal.Width, y=Petal.Length, 
                                   color=Species)) + geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06A/4-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::


## Vamos ver se temos alguma relação entre as variáveis 4


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Petal.Width, y=Petal.Length, color=Species)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06A/4a-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::


## Vamos ver como se distribui o Petal.Width


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% ggplot(aes(x=Petal.Width, 
                                   fill=Species)) + 
                                   geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06A/5-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::


## Vamos ver como se distribui o Petal.Length


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Petal.Length, fill=Species)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](imagens/Aula06A/6-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::
